column4: hey i have a mp3 file that is 320kbps bit rate how can i make it to 192kbps so my cell can play it?
how can i make smaller the bit rate of a mp3 file?
For the best quality, it's best to re-encode from the source, i.e., re-rip from a CD
Actually, you can do it with lame. Type lame --help into the terminal to see what options do what
